name: Dawn of the Crab
description:
You're a lost crab on a deserted island, can you find out the mysteries of this forsaken island?

This is my first actual game I made, using Gamemaker Studio 2 and Aseprite. I hope you guys like it!

By the way there is a hidden key in the game, see if you can find it!

W A S D to move Around.

Click on objects to interact.
